TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDbDataAdapter implements class System.Data.IDataAdapter

summary.span: 表示與命令相關的屬性集，這些屬性是用來填入 並更新資料來源，並且由存取關聯式資料庫的 .NET Framework 資料提供者所實作。

span.span: Represents a set of command-related properties that are used to fill the and update a data source, and is implemented by .NET Framework data providers that access relational databases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 介面繼承自介面，並讓物件建立資料配接器設計用於關聯式資料庫。The interface inherits from the interface and allows an object to create a DataAdapter designed for use with a relational database. 介面，並選擇性地公用程式類別， ，允許繼承的類別來實作資料配接器類別，代表資料來源之間的橋樑和。The interface and, optionally, the utility class, , allow an inheriting class to implement a DataAdapter class, which represents the bridge between a data source and a . 如需詳細資料配接器類別的詳細資訊，請參閱[填入資料集從 DataAdapter](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/populating-a-dataset-from-a-dataadapter.md)。For more information about DataAdapter classes, see [Populating a DataSet from a DataAdapter](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/populating-a-dataset-from-a-dataadapter.md). 如需實作.NET Framework 資料提供者的詳細資訊，請參閱[ [ \]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a9fa1926-071b-4c6f-997d-a16bac633852)。For more information about implementing .NET Framework data providers, see [[\]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a9fa1926-071b-4c6f-997d-a16bac633852). 應用程式不會建立的執行個體介面直接，但是會建立繼承的類別的執行個體和。An application does not create an instance of the interface directly, but creates an instance of a class that inherits and . 繼承的類別必須實作繼承的成員，和通常用來定義其他成員將提供者特有的功能。Classes that inherit must implement the inherited members, and typically define additional members to add provider-specific functionality. 例如，介面會定義屬性，而介面會定義採用方法做為參數。For example, the interface defines the property, and the interface defines a method that takes a as a parameter. 接著，類別會繼承屬性和方法，而且也會定義兩個其他多載採取 ADO 資料錄集物件做為參數的方法。In turn, the class inherits the property and the method, and also defines two additional overloads of the method that take an ADO Recordset object as a parameter. ## Examples 下列範例會使用衍生的類別， ，和來選取資料來源的記錄。The following example uses the derived classes, , and , to select records from a data source. 區域分布再傳回。The filled is then returned. 若要完成這項作業，方法會傳遞初始化，連接字串和 TRANSACT-SQL SELECT 陳述式的查詢字串。To accomplish this, the method is passed an initialized , a connection string, and a query string that is a Transact-SQL SELECT statement. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.para:
若要升級.NET Framework 資料提供者之間的一致性，命名為繼承的類別，在表單中DataAdapter 其中是提供給特定的.NET Framework 資料提供者命名空間中的所有類別的統一前置詞。例如，是前置詞類別命名空間。當您繼承自介面，您應該實作下列建構函式： 項目描述
PrvDataAdapter() 初始化 PrvDataAdapter 類別的新執行個體。
PrvDataAdapter (PrvCommand selectCommand) 初始化指定的 SQL SELECT 陳述式的 PrvDataAdapter 類別的新執行個體。
（字串 selectCommandText、 字串 selectConnectionString） PrvDataAdapter 初始化 SQL SELECT 陳述式與連接字串的 PrvDataAdapter 類別的新執行個體。
（字串 selectCommandText、 PrvConnection selectConnection） PrvDataAdapter 初始化 SQL SELECT 陳述式和 PrvConnection 物件 PrvDataAdapter 類別的新執行個體。

To promote consistency among .NET Framework data providers, name the inheriting class in the form DataAdapter where is the uniform prefix given to all classes in a specific .NET Framework data provider namespace. For example, is the prefix of the class in the namespace. When you inherit from the interface, you should implement the following constructors: Item Description
PrvDataAdapter() Initializes a new instance of the PrvDataAdapter class.
PrvDataAdapter(PrvCommand selectCommand) Initializes a new instance of the PrvDataAdapter class with the specified SQL SELECT statement.
PrvDataAdapter(string selectCommandText, string selectConnectionString) Initializes a new instance of the PrvDataAdapter class with an SQL SELECT statement and a connection string.
PrvDataAdapter(string selectCommandText, PrvConnection selectConnection) Initializes a new instance of the PrvDataAdapter class with an SQL SELECT statement and a PrvConnection object.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Data::IDbCommand ^ DeleteCommand { System::Data::IDbCommand ^ get(); void set(System::Data::IDbCommand ^ value); };
member this.DeleteCommand : System.Data.IDbCommand with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定 SQL 陳述式從資料集刪除資料錄。

span.span: Gets or sets an SQL statement for deleting records from the data set.

value.span: ，在 期間用來為資料集中所刪除的資料列刪除在資料來源中的資料錄。

span.span: An used during to delete records in the data source for deleted rows in the data set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 期間，如果沒有設定這個屬性，並且出現在主索引鍵資訊、如果您將可以自動產生`SelectCommand`.NET Framework 資料提供者的屬性。During , if this property is not set and primary key information is present in the , the can be generated automatically if you set the `SelectCommand` property of a .NET Framework data provider. 然後，您未設定任何其他命令會產生 CommandBuilder。Then, any additional commands that you do not set are generated by the CommandBuilder. 此產生邏輯需要索引鍵資料行資訊會出現在。This generation logic requires key column information to be present in the . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Commandbuilder 產生命令](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md)。For more information see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md). 當指派到先前建立、不會被複製。When is assigned to a previously created , the is not cloned. 維護參考先前建立的物件。The maintains a reference to the previously created object. ## Examples 下列範例會建立繼承的執行個體類別，並設定和屬性。The following example creates an instance of the inherited class, and sets the and properties. 它會假設您已經建立物件。It assumes you have already created an object. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DbDataAdapter.DeleteCommand Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DbDataAdapter.DeleteCommand Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DbDataAdapter.DeleteCommand Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DbDataAdapter.DeleteCommand Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定用來將新的資料錄插入至資料來源的 SQL 陳述式。

span.span: Gets or sets an SQL statement used to insert new records into the data source.

value.span: ，在 期間用來為資料集中新的資料列插入在資料來源中的資料錄。

span.span: An used during to insert records in the data source for new rows in the data set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 期間，如果沒有設定這個屬性，並且出現在主索引鍵資訊、如果您將可以自動產生`SelectCommand`.NET Framework 資料提供者的屬性。During , if this property is not set and primary key information is present in the , the can be generated automatically if you set the `SelectCommand` property of a .NET Framework data provider. 然後，您未設定任何其他命令會產生 CommandBuilder。Then, any additional commands that you do not set are generated by the CommandBuilder. 此產生邏輯需要索引鍵資料行資訊會出現在。This generation logic requires key column information to be present in the . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Commandbuilder 產生命令](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md)。For more information see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md). 當指派到先前建立、不會被複製。When is assigned to a previously created , the is not cloned. 維護參考先前建立的物件。The maintains a reference to the previously created object. > [!NOTE] > 如果執行此命令會傳回資料列，這些資料列可能會加入至根據如何設定屬性物件。If execution of this command returns rows, these rows may be added to the depending on how you set the property of the object. ## Examples 下列範例會建立繼承的執行個體類別，並設定和屬性。The following example creates an instance of the inherited class, and sets the and properties. 它會假設您已經建立物件。It assumes you have already created an object. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DbDataAdapter.InsertCommand Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DbDataAdapter.InsertCommand Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DbDataAdapter.InsertCommand Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DbDataAdapter.InsertCommand Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定用來在資料來源中選取資料錄的 SQL 陳述式。

span.span: Gets or sets an SQL statement used to select records in the data source.

value.span: ，在 期間用來為資料集中的位置從資料來源選取資料錄。

span.span: An that is used during to select records from data source for placement in the data set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當指派到先前建立、不會被複製。When is assigned to a previously created , the is not cloned. 維護參考先前建立的物件。The maintains a reference to the previously created object. 如果不會傳回任何資料列，資料表不會加入至，並會引發任何例外狀況。If the does not return any rows, no tables are added to the , and no exception is raised. ## Examples 下列範例會建立繼承的執行個體類別，並設定和屬性。The following example creates an instance of the inherited class, and sets the and properties. 它會假設您已經建立物件。It assumes you have already created an object. remarks.format: ## Remarks 期間，如果沒有設定這個屬性，並且出現在主索引鍵資訊、如果您將可以自動產生`SelectCommand`.NET Framework 資料提供者的屬性。During , if this property is not set and primary key information is present in the , the can be generated automatically if you set the `SelectCommand` property of a .NET Framework data provider. 然後，您未設定任何其他命令會產生 CommandBuilder。Then, any additional commands that you do not set are generated by the CommandBuilder. 此產生邏輯需要索引鍵資料行資訊會出現在。This generation logic requires key column information to be present in the . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Commandbuilder 產生命令](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md)。For more information see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md). 當指派到先前建立、不會被複製。When is assigned to a previously created , the is not cloned. 維護參考先前建立的物件。The maintains a reference to the previously created object. > [!NOTE] > 如果執行此命令會傳回資料列，這些資料列會加入至。If execution of this command returns rows, these rows are added to the . ## Examples 下列範例會建立繼承的執行個體類別，並設定和屬性。The following example creates an instance of the inherited class, and sets the and properties. 它會假設您已經建立物件。It assumes you have already created an object. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OleDbDataAdapter.UpdateCommand Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbDataAdapter.UpdateCommand Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OleDbDataAdapter.UpdateCommand Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbDataAdapter.UpdateCommand Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
